## Type of documentation request

> - [ ] Missing documentation
> - [ ] Incorrect / Outdated documentation
> - [ ] Needs clarification
> - [ ] Add examples or tutorials
> - [ ] Restructure / Improve organization
> - [ ] Other

## (Opt.) Documentation location

File, page, link, or section title (if applicable)

## Issue / Request

Clearly describe what is missing, wrong, unclear, or requested.

## (Opt.) Related Issues / Links

Link issues, PRs, or external references.
